about_the_game:
FG Monster Kit Aberations Art Pack


The Monster Kit Aberations Art Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art pack consists of images that can be used to create strange and monstrous creatures in a paper doll-style process. By combining heads, torsos, legs, and many more parts you are able to make a vast array of creatures for whatever you might need. This pack works seamlessly with Monster Kit, Monster Kit Robots, and Monster Kit Beasts. This pack includes the following items:

  • token frames and token backgrounds
  • Multiple Aberation heads of aquatic creatures, skulls, monsters, and more
  • Miscellaneous body parts for eyes, mouths, ears, and so on 
  • Many types of limbs
  • Several strange torsos
  • Backgrounds and set dressings
"
